item.title: Gfx's
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

if(spellID == 12929) // blood barrage (lvl 92 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 91)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 30)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 30)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 10)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
sendMessage("You need 30 “+getItemName(560)+”, 30 “+getItemName(565)+” and 10 "+getItemName(566));
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 30)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 30)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 10)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(25);
NewHP += hitDiff / 2;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
}
updateRequired = true;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
actionTimer = 10;
stillgfx(497,castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
stillgfx(287,castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(373, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“Your life has been drained!”);
sendMessage(“You drain the enemys life and add it to yours.”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 30);
deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 30);
deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 10);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 91)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 92 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

stillgfx(287,absY,absX); Add This For Another GFX On The casting Player
stillgfx(287,castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);This Will Go On The Other Player

Read full topic

item.title: Gfx's
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

dude here is the code if(spellID == 12929) // blood barrage (lvl 92 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 91) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 30)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 30)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(566, 10)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 30 "+getItemName(560)+", 30 "+getItemName(565)+" and 10 "+getItemName(566)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 30)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 30)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(566, 10)==true)) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(25); NewHP += hitDiff / 2; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(497,castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(373, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Your life has been drained!"); sendMessage("You drain the enemys life and add it to yours."); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 30); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 30); deleteItem(566, getItemSlot(566), 10); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 91) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 92 to cast this spell."); } }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2007, 11:46:31 AM[/size][hr]now…how do i add ANOTHER one[br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2007, 11:46:53 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Gfx's
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

All You Do is Add It In The Spell Code.
stillgfx(GRAPHIC HERE, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); This Is On The Enemy
stillgfx(GRAPHIC HERE,absY,absX); This Is OnYou
The Current Graphics I Know
